Boat Trailer Soft Wobble Rollers Kits 5 Inch Blue Ribbed 18MM Bore Accessories Parts

Tired of your boat trailer rollers causing unnecessary friction and wear? Upgrade to our Boat Trailer Soft Wobble Rollers Kits for a smoother, safer launching experience.

These high-quality kits feature 5-inch blue ribbed rollers with an 18mm bore designed to absorb shock and minimize movement during transport. Say goodbye to annoying vibrations and hello to a more comfortable ride for both you and your vessel.

  • Soft Wobble Design: Reduces friction and wear on your boat hull, extending its lifespan.
  • Durable Blue Ribbed Construction: Provides superior grip and traction even in wet conditions.
  • 18mm Bore Size: Fits a wide range of trailer bunks for compatibility with various boats.

Our Boat Trailer Soft Wobble Rollers Kits are an essential upgrade for any boat owner who wants to protect their investment and enjoy a smoother, more enjoyable towing experience.

View on AliExpress

This Boat Trailer Soft Wobble Rollers Kit is designed to enhance the smooth launching and retrieval of your boat from the water. Featuring soft, ribbed rollers that gently cradle the hull, these kits minimize friction and reduce stress on both your boat and trailer.

  • Soft, Blue Ribbed Rollers: Provide a cushioned surface for your boat's hull, minimizing scratches and reducing wear and tear.
  • Wobble Design: Allows for slight movement, accommodating uneven trailer surfaces and boat positioning.
  • 18mm Bore: Compatible with a wide range of trailer axles and bunk systems.

The Boat Trailer Soft Wobble Rollers Kit comes in sets of five 5-inch rollers, offering optimal coverage for various boat sizes.

By replacing traditional hard rollers with these soft wobble rollers, you can experience several benefits:

  • Reduced Friction: The cushioned surface minimizes drag during launching and retrieval, making the process smoother and easier.
  • Protection for Boat Hull: Soft rollers gently cradle the hull, preventing scratches, dents, and other damage.
  • Improved Stability: Wobble design helps keep your boat securely in place on the trailer, even on uneven surfaces.

These soft wobble rollers are a direct replacement for existing hard rollers on your boat trailer. Simply remove the old rollers and install these new ones using the appropriate mounting hardware (not included).
